name: Journey To The Otherside
description:
Story:

You wake up one morning wanting something. You set out on a journey to find that something but, oh no, there's some obstacles on the path. Are you strong enough to overcum them?

Gameplay:

Similar to Pokemon and the early Final Fantasy games without the battle mode. Talk the characters and explore the world for the story to advance. Very similar to a visual novel.

Playtime Length:

5 to 15 minutes

Controls:

WASD and Z
